data.name: DatabaseNameLengthWarning
data.value: WARNING: The database name is at its maximum length. If "{0}" is the full e-book title, this should not be an issue. If the title is supposed to be longer than that, you might get an error on your Kindle (WG on firmware before 5.6). Shorten the title in Calibre or change the database name manually.
